bio: A tank who trundled off toward the enemy but got badly lost. At least his heart's in the right place.

soultimate.name: Tank 'n' Spank
soultimate.description: Deal massive damage to foes nearby.

skill.effect: Spd ↑ when attacked, 1.6% ↑ per hit, lasts till death.
skill.name: Hit and Run

name: Mistank
